citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:35p on
07-Mar-18.
ACI Bartels arrived at the location, went to the front door, and was greeted by a minor family member. The family
member stated the licensee wasn't home and would not return until the evening. ACI Bartels left a business card
for the licensee to make contact.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:35p on
07-Mar-18.
ACI Bartels arrived at the location, went to the front door, and was greeted by a minor family member.  The family
member stated the licensee wasn't home and would not return until the evening.  ACI Bartels left a business card
for the licensee to make contact.
